com.pilot.jword.writer
Class PDFGraphics

java.lang.Object
  com.pilot.jword.writer.PDFGraphics

public class PDFGraphics
extends java.lang.Object

This class produces PDFs using the Apache FOP library. Allow ordinary Graphics2D calls to be transcoded to PDF pages. Reflection is used to load and call Apache FOP classes. If the EditorKit is not supporting export to PDF, FOP libraries will not be needed in the class path.
